recipe.title: Amansala Salad with Ginger-Sesame Dressing
ingredients: 1 (5- to 6-ounce) piece grilled fish or chicken, chopped
instructions: 1. Combine the cabbage, lettuce, carrots, tomatoes, avocado, and fish or chicken in a large bowl and toss with the dressing to taste. 2. Sprinkle with the toasted sesame seeds and serve.
1. Combine the cabbage, lettuce, carrots, tomatoes, avocado, and fish or chicken in a large bowl and toss with the dressing to taste.
2. Sprinkle with the toasted sesame seeds and serve.
